[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”116deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#282723 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 74%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#282723″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”74%” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Night-labyrinth-header-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”10%||10%||false|false” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Hero Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”46px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_font_size=”79px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#6b0906″ header_2_font_size=”74px” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

enchanted journeys

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_text_color=”#282723″ header_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_text_color=”#FFB69E” header_2_font_size=”33px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_4_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_font_size_tablet=”29px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A series of guided imagination meditations

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ min_height=”795.4px” custom_padding=”2px||5px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”797.4px” custom_padding=”53px||94px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”34px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A collection of thirteen guided imagination audio files: £18

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”||62px|||” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘Enchanted Journeys’ is a collection of thirteen audio files, each of which offers a guided imagination journey around 25 – 30 minutes long, narrated by Dr Sharon Blackie and priced at £18 for the collection.

All of these meditations are designed to help you to work with your deep imagination, engage with the imaginal world and develop resources for activating your mythic imagination.

Please find a list of the contents below, and scroll to the bottom of the page to purchase this collection. You will then be able to listen to your audio files on this website, or download them for use on other devices.

Please note that if you are a member of my ‘This Mythic Life’ online course, you already have access to these journeys and do not need to purchase them again.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The journeys

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘DREAMWEAVING’ DEEP IMAGINATION JOURNEY

This journey offers you a core practice for working with your deep imagination and engaging with the imaginal world. In this journey, you’re encouraged to enter a safe space in order to present yourself to the imaginal world and see what would like to come to you.

You can also use this technique to engage with images and characters from your nightdreams, and from myths and stories which move you deeply, as well as from other forms of art.

1. THE WOLVES

A guided imagination journey designed to help you uncover and explore elements of the Wild Man or Woman archetype within.

2. THE ANCESTORS

A guided imagination journey designed to help you engage with your ancestors.

3. SANCTUARY IN THE FOREST

A guided imagination journey designed to help you find sanctuary in the dark forest.

4. THE INTERCONNECTED COSMOS

A guided imagination journey designed to help you find your steps in a dance with the cosmos.

5. EMBODIED IMAGINATION

A guided imagination journey designed to help you enter into an imaginal dialogue with your body.

6. PROTECTION IN DARK PLACES

A guided imagination journey designed to help you develop a sense of protection as you enter dark and difficult places.

7. THE SHAPE OF YOUR JOURNEY

A guided imagination journey designed to help you gain perspective on the nature of your own unique path through life, and the terrain through which you’ve passed.

8. ROOTINGS

A guided imagination journey designed to help you root and ground yourself in the world around you.

9. THE WITCH

A guided imagination journey which takes you on a journey to visit the Old Woman of the World, the Hag of the Ages, the Witch of all Witches.

10. PSYCHE AND EROS: THE SOUL’S JOURNEY HOME

A guided imagination journey which takes you on a journey to work through the tasks set by Venus for Psyche.

11. THE ALCHEMIST’S CAVE

A guided imagination journey which takes you on a journey to the Alchemist’s Cave.

12. DESCENT

A guided imagination journey which takes you on a journey to the Underworld.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.20.4″ background_color=”#FCFCF2″ custom_margin=”-6px|||||” custom_padding=”5px||36px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ min_height=”326px” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”30px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#893E39″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”45px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

PURCHASE ‘ENCHANTED JOURNEYS’ HERE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_3_font_size=”28px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”408px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

This collection of 13 guided imagination journeys is priced at £18. Please follow the link below to make your payment using any credit or debit card. (For those of you in other countries: currency exchange rates change by the hour, and so we’re not able to tell you what the cost of this collection is in your currency. This currency converter offers you live rates, though they may or may not reflect the rates actually given to you by your bank or credit card provider. It will, however, give you an indication.)

IMPORTANT INFORMATION – PLEASE READ FIRST!

When you sign up, you’ll become a member of this website. Please record the username, email address and password that you register with so that you can log in and access the recording in future. You can make any changes in the ‘account’ section of the menu bar.

After you’ve paid, you’ll be redirected to the page where you’ll find your audio files. Please bookmark it for future use. You can also access it from the ‘Members area’ section of the menu bar: click on ‘Enchanted Journeys’ under the dropdown menu.

If you have a discount code, you must enter it by clicking on the ‘Have a coupon’ link above the ‘Select payment method’ section below, before completing your payment.  We cannot apply discount codes after the event, or create partial refunds in the case of errors.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.24.0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

*  Please agree to the Terms & Conditions to continue

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_text_color=”#282723″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Please note before purchasing, that no refunds can be given for this package of audio files.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.1″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter, ‘The Art of Enchantment’, on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

If you’d like to become a paid subscriber, you’ll have access to exclusive articles, podcasts, chat and much more

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
